nodes.text: Mandalorian wristdarts or wristdarts were a prized collectors weapon that came in matched sets.

Consisting of wristlets that fitted around the wrist by means of a clasp, the wristlets contained a spring mechanism that would fire a profusion of tiny and deadly darts when the wearer moved their fingers a certain way. Deadly by themselves, the darts could additionally be poisoned.

The t'landa Til Teroenza once offered a pair of matched set wristdarts to the bounty hunter Boba Fett, simply to gain an audience with him. Later, Boba Fett would poison one set with a Neurotoxin, and the other with a soporific; though he never got the chance to use them on his target, Han Solo.
